## Exploratory data analysis ##

What is the age distribution across cohorts

```{r, eval=FALSE}

data(methData_F2_cleaned)
cData <- colData(methData)

library(ggplot2)
biobank_ordered <- with(cData, reorder(biobank, Age, median, na.rm=TRUE))
gp <- ggplot(pheno, aes(biobank_ordered, Age))
gp <- gp + geom_boxplot(aes(fill = factor(Sex)))
gp <- gp + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 0, size=7))
gp
```
